channel.title: CVE Feed for Hammock Corporation -- AssetView
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hammock Corporation -- AssetView

item.title: CVE-2022-28719|2024-08-03T06:03:52.606Z -- hammock%20corporation -- assetview
item.description: Missing authentication for critical function in AssetView prior to Ver.13.2.0 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker with some knowledge on the system configuration to upload a crafted configuration file to the managing server, which may result in the managed clients to execute arbitrary code with the administrative privilege.
